attributes.action: Request the resignation of Theresa May.
attributes.background: Theresa May has now made it clear she has no intention of carrying out the democratic will of the people by exiting the UK from the EU. Her intended actions will seriously damage the UK’s ability to trade outside the EU and keep the UK under EU control.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
